data.eml:eml: Sialis navasi, a new alderfly species from China (Megaloptera: Sialidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Hayashi, Fumio, Yang, Ding (2009): Sialis navasi, a new alderfly species from China (Megaloptera: Sialidae). Zootaxa 2230: 64-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190282
